CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 3, 1962, pg. 2B, reads: "Deacon Ordination at Rodman - Messrs. George W. Blakey and LeRoy Yuille were ordained as deacons of the Rodman Street Baptist Church, Jan. 28 at 3:30 P. M. Seated are (left to right): Mr. Blakey and Mr. LeRoy. Mrs. Blakey and Mrs. Yuille are standing behind their husbands. Also standing: Rev. George W. Coles and (back row) Rev. J. C. Hairston, Deacon John Covington, Revs. F. H. Austin, G. L. Bowick, O. L. Simms, P. W. Phillips, Maurice Tyler and H. S. Cuff.  Rev. Mr. Bowick is pastor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, seated from left: George W. Blakey and Leroy Yuille; standing: Rev. George W. Coles, Mrs. Blakey, Lena Yuille, Rev. J. C. Hairston, John Covington, Rev. F. H. Austin, Rev. G. L. Bowick, O. L. Simms, P. W. Phillips, Maurice Tyler, and H. S. Cuff, posed in Rodman Street Baptist Church
